item.title: 二手交易市场 Vinted 首席执行官表示暂不考虑 IPO
item.description: Vinted是欧洲最大的二手服装在线交易市场，该公司目前正在排除首次公开募股的可能性，因为它正专注于向时尚以外的领域拓展。【原文：Vinted, Europe’s largest online marketplace for second-hand clothes, is ruling out an initial public offering for now as it focuses on expanding beyond fashion.】

item.title: 有望首次公开募股的诺巴银行目标是在北欧地区扩张
item.description: 瑞典金融服务集团诺巴银行集团（NOBA Bank Group AB）首席执行官雅各布-伦德布拉德（Jacob Lundblad）表示，该集团在北欧地区发现了 "几个令人兴奋的扩张机会"。【原文：Swedish financial services group NOBA Bank Group AB has identified “several exciting opportunities for expansion” in the Nordic region, according to Chief Executive Officer Jacob Lundblad.】

item.title: 英国第三季度经济放缓幅度超预期
item.description: 英国经济在第三季度的降温速度超过预期，这标志着首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）推动经济增长的承诺出现了一个令人失望的开端。【原文：The UK economy cooled faster than expected in the third quarter, marking a disappointing start to Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s promise to turbocharge growth.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司起诉阻止加州深度伪造欺骗法案
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 起诉阻止加州一项旨在遏制人工智能在社交媒体上生成欺骗性选举内容的法律，声称该措施是对言论自由的违宪侮辱。【原文：Elon Musk’s social media platform X sued to block a California law aimed at curbing AI-generated deceptive election content on social media, claiming the measure is an unconstitutional affront to free speech.】

item.title: 中国本土制药商贝格基因将更名以适应全球发展需要
item.description: 中国领先的创新型抗癌药生产商贝因美有限公司计划更名为 BeOne Medicines，作为品牌重塑的一部分，以支持其在美国和欧洲等市场的增长雄心。【原文：China’s leading innovative cancer drugmaker BeiGene Ltd. plans to change its name to BeOne Medicines as part of a rebranding to support its growth ambitions in markets including the US and Europe.】

item.title: 尽管伊朗天然气储量丰富，但为何仍不断发生停电事故？
item.description: 伊朗的天然气储量位居世界第二，但这仍不足以让该国在今年冬天保持灯火通明。【原文：Iran has the world’s second-biggest reserves of natural gas, but that’s still not enough for the country to keep the lights on this winter.】

item.title: 韩国反对党领袖被判犯有选举罪
item.description: 韩国一家法院周五判定该国反对党领袖违反选举法，这给这位一直被认为是韩国下任总统最有力竞争者的人的政治前景蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：A South Korean court on Friday convicted the country’s opposition leader of violating election laws, casting a shadow over the political prospects of a man who has been considered a top contender to be the nation’s next president.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国第三季度经济增长低于预期
中国移动正在洽谈购买从大亨手中没收的香港电信塔
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国移动香港公司正在洽谈购买陷入困境的富豪陈红天曾经拥有的香港商业地产。【原文：China Mobile Hong Kong is in talks to buy commercial property in Hong Kong once owned by struggling tycoon Chen Hongtian, according to people familiar with matter.】

item.title: JioStar 瞄准印度流媒体市场，提供节俭产品
item.description: JioStar 是由信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd. ）的媒体业务与华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：JioStar, the entity created from the merger of Reliance Industries Ltd.’s media business with Walt Disney Co.’s local unit, is looking to capture a large chunk of the nation’s $28 billion entertainment market currently dominated by Netflix Inc. and Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 加拿大邮政工人罢工，威胁假日运输
item.description: 在国家邮政局的工人举行罢工之后，加拿大人今年在收到节日礼物和购物时可能会面临延误。【原文：Canadians may face delays in getting their holiday gifts and purchases this year after workers at the national postal service went on strike.】

item.title: Meta 将对允许学校和州就吸毒问题提起诉讼的命令提出上诉
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司表示，该公司打算对法院的裁决提出上诉，这些裁决允许全美数十个州和数百个学区继续提起诉讼，指责 "成瘾性 "社交媒体应用程序导致了青少年的心理健康危机。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. said it intends to appeal court rulings allowing dozens of states and hundreds of school districts across the US to proceed with lawsuits blaming “addictive” social media apps for contributing to a mental health crisis among youths.】

item.title: 估值下降，三星股价创近四年最大涨幅
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）的股价创下 2021 年 1 月以来的最佳表现，因为越来越多的人认为，这家韩国科技公司在经历了数月的低迷之后，开始变得物美价廉。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. shares are having their best day since January 2021, as perceptions grow that the South Korean tech company is starting to look like a bargain after a multi-month slump.】

item.title: 印尼进行干预，印尼盾接近每美元 16,000 元的关键水平
item.description: 印尼央行在印尼盾汇率跌至 1 美元兑 16000 印尼盾的心理价位后，对货币市场进行了干预，以支持印尼盾。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank intervened in currency markets to support the rupiah after it weakened toward the psychological level of 16,000 per dollar.】

item.title: 任天堂用专利技术对抗 "带枪的神奇宝贝
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）大力保护广泛的知识产权的背后，是一个善于利用专利武器打击潜在对手的法律团队。现在，这些律师正把目光投向一家凭借一款被业界称为 "带枪神奇宝贝 "的游戏而崭露头角的工作室。【原文：Behind Nintendo Co.’s fierce protection of wide-ranging intellectual property is a legal team adept at weaponizing patents against potential rivals. Now those attorneys are setting their sights on a studio that’s risen to prominence with a game the industry has dubbed Pokémon With Guns.】

item.title: 渣打银行依靠非洲富豪推动增长
item.description: 过去三年，渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）在非洲大陆的财富业务管理资产翻了一番多，目前正依靠非洲的超级富豪扩大业务。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is banking on the ultra-rich in Africa to expand its business after more than doubling assets under management in its wealth business on the continent the past three years.】

item.title: 马斯克升级与奥特曼的法律纠纷，将 OpenAI 定义为垄断者
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的争斗愈演愈烈，他在一份法庭文件中指控 OpenAI 试图占领人工智能生成器市场，并在竞争中牺牲安全性。【原文：Elon Musk is ramping up his feud with Sam Altman, alleging in a court filing that OpenAI is trying to corner the market for generative artificial intelligence and sacrificing safety in a race to get ahead.】

item.title: 英国财政大臣从英国央行的悄然变动中获得高达 100 亿英镑的收益
item.description: 它的宣布几乎只是一个脚注。但英格兰银行债券投资组合管理方式的改变，为英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在未来几年释放了多达 100 亿英镑（127 亿美元）的资金，有助于控制借贷。【原文：It was announced as almost a footnote. But a change to the way the Bank of England’s bond portfolio is managed has freed up as much as £10 billion ($12.7 billion) for UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves in coming years, helping to keep a lid on borrowing.】

item.title: 越南科技银行愿意向合适的合作伙伴出售 15%的股份
item.description: 越南技术商业银行（Vietnam Technological & Commercial JSB）首席执行官延斯-洛特纳（Jens Lottner）表示，该公司由华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）支持，将考虑向合适的战略投资者出售 15%的股份。【原文：Vietnam Technological & Commercial JSB, known as Techcombank and backed by Warburg Pincus, would consider selling a 15% stake to the right strategic investor, according to Chief Executive Officer Jens Lottner.】

item.title: 新加坡郊区需求带动房屋销售创 11 个月新高
item.description: 由于开发商在郊区释放了更多库存，新加坡的房屋销售量上升到近一年来的最高水平。【原文：Singapore home sales rose to the highest level in nearly a year, after developers released more inventory in suburban districts.】

item.title: 美元走强、中国需求低迷，金属本周遭遇重创
item.description: 由于美元走强和对中国需求的担忧挥之不去，基本金属遭受暴跌，铜价正走向半个多世纪以来最长的单周跌势。【原文：Copper is heading for its longest run of weekly losses in more than half a decade, as base metals suffer steep declines on a strong dollar and lingering concerns over Chinese demand.】

item.title: 泰珀和伯里预示着中国购买 "一切 "贸易的终结
item.description: 全球最著名的两位投资者发出信号，中国股市全面上涨的日子可能要结束了。【原文：Two of the world’s most prominent investors are signaling the days of across-the-board gains in Chinese stocks may be ending.】

item.title: 马来西亚经济因投资激增而保持强劲增长
item.description: 由于投资激增和国内支出增加，马来西亚第三季度的经济增长符合预期，并有望达到官方预测。【原文：Malaysia’s economy expanded as expected in the third quarter, while remaining on track to meet official forecasts on a surge in investments and increased domestic spending.】

item.title: 中国数据中心公司 Zdata 据称考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国数据中心公司Zdata Technologies Co.【原文：Chinese data center firm Zdata Technologies Co. is considering a potential initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国准备提供更多财政支持以维持增长势头
item.description: 泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦的高级助手表示，泰国正在制定一系列新的财政措施，以维持经济复苏、促进新的外国投资并降低接近历史最高水平的家庭债务。【原文：Thailand is working on a raft of fresh fiscal measures to sustain an economic recovery, foster new foreign investment and lower the near-record household debt, Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra’s top aide said.】

item.title: 高盛日本合伙人横手 20 多年后退休
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一份内部备忘录显示，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s longest actively serving partner in Tokyo is leaving the company, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 中国钢铁生产复苏，市场对刺激政策作出反应
item.description: 随着中国政府努力重振经济增长，市场情绪有所好转，10 月份中国钢铁产量恢复增长，结束了连续四个月的下降趋势。【原文：Chinese steel output recovered in October, snapping four months of declines, as sentiment brightens following Beijing’s efforts to rekindle economic growth.】

item.title: 顶级银行称赌场或将引领菲律宾 2025 年首次公开募股的复兴
item.description: 菲律宾最大银行的高管们表示，明年两家菲律宾赌场可能会与基础设施和食品公司一起重启首次公开募股计划，这为因上市数量不足而陷入低迷的股市带来了希望。【原文：Two Philippine casinos may revive initial public offering plans next year along with infrastructure and food companies, executives at the nation’s biggest bank said, offering hopes for a sluggish stock market that’s been hit by a dearth of listings.】

item.title: 消费增长超预期，中国经济趋于稳定
item.description: 上个月，中国经济出现企稳迹象，零售额增幅创八个月来新高，这表明中国政府最新一轮的经济刺激政策推动了一些关键行业的发展。【原文：China’s economy showed signs of stabilization last month, buoyed by the highest retail sales growth in eight months and indicating Beijing’s latest round of stimulus has boosted some key sectors.】

item.title: 7 万亿美元现金堆不断扩大，令华尔街怀疑论者望而却步
item.description: 今年本应是货币市场大逃亡的一年。【原文：It was supposed to be the year of the great money-market exodus.】
